title: Suppress OpenPGP fallback stderr noise
rationale: Wrap openpgp.decrypt in try/finally that swaps console.error to no-op during call and restores original immediately after to keep CLI output clean without changing decryption behavior.

name: progress-math-guards
description: Progress display code should guard invalid math paths: return 0.0 B for non-finite/negative byte values, compute percent with total > 0 checks, and compute speed only when elapsed > 0.

title: Avoid Bun resp.json SIMD parser path
rationale: Bun v1.3.9 can SIGFPE on Graph API JSON with large integers when using Response.json(); parsing via JSON.parse(await response.text()) avoids the crash path while keeping payload semantics.

title: Use Commander parseAsync in CLI entrypoint
rationale: Async command handlers (upload action) must be awaited; parse() can let process exit early in Bun compiled binary teardown.
